text: Miranda Freeman (born March 23, 1995) is an American soccer player who plays as a defender for Sky Blue FC in the NWSL. ==Career== Freeman played for USC from 2013 to 2016, she was part of team that won the 2016 NCAA National Championship. ===Sky Blue FC, 2017-present=== Freeman was drafted by Sky Blue FC with the 10th overall pick in the 2017 NWSL College Draft. She appeared in 21 games in the 2017 season. Freeman returned to Sky Blue FC for the 2018 NWSL season, where she once again appeared in 21 games for the team. Freeman tore the achilles tendon in her right ankle during preseason training ahead of the 2019 NWSL season, this injury would rule her out for the season. ==References== ==External links== * USC bio * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:African-American women's soccer players Category:American women's soccer players Category:National Women's Soccer League players Category:People from Palm Beach County, Florida Category:Sky Blue FC (NWSL) draft picks Category:Sky Blue FC (NWSL) players Category:Soccer players from Florida Category:Sportspeople from the Miami metropolitan area Category:United States women's under-20 international soccer players Category:USC Trojans women's soccer players Category:Women's association football defenders
title: Mandy Freeman
